data.caption: Clarification On Price Movement
data.news_body: Clarification on Price Movement.

data.caption: Clarification sought from Apollo Pipes Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from Apollo Pipes Ltd on February 10 2026 with reference to significant movement in price in order to ensure that investors have latest relevant information about the company and to inform the market so that the interest of the investors is safeguarded.

The reply is awaited.
